titulo: Whiskerwood, a city builder about mice colonising the seas, contains a lot more revolution against oppressive imperial regimes than I expected

titulo: What? Call of Duty is skipping over Modern Warfare 4 and releasing Black Ops 7 this year instead

titulo: Ninja Gaiden 4 looks sick, is out in October, and has the exact storytelling I demand from a ninja game: 'You're a wanted criminal now'
